Title: Outlook: Improved interaction in the subject header section on Outlook on the Web and New Outlook for Windows
Description:
The subject header section that shows up at the top when reading an email will be improved. This includes the component that contains meeting information when looking at a meeting invitation and other similar components. The subject header section will be more sensitive to available space and allow for a more comfortable reading experience when on smaller screens or on displays with high scale factors. #newoutlookforwindows
GA date: June CY2025
